scripts.build: babel actions -d dist/actions --presets es2015,babel-preset-stage-2 && babel reducers -d dist/reducers --presets es2015,babel-preset-stage-2 && babel lib -d dist/lib --presets es2015,babel-preset-stage-2 && babel index.js -d dist --presets es2015,babel-preset-stage-2 && babel server -d dist/server --presets es2015,babel-preset-stage-2
